content: chart a knit 11 13 15 rounds of p1 mc k1 cc 8 times and p1 k3 4 5 6 times chart a alternates with 11 13 15 rounds in the simple stitch intarsia motif p1 mc k1 cc 8 times and this will continue throughout the foot needle 2 at the same time work appropriate row of chart b followed by p1 k3 4 5 6 times to the line indicated for your size thheeerl et uarrne 27 31 35 stitches between heel markers set up round 1 needle 1 work as set needle 2 move heel markers for one stitch apart on each side you have added 30 34 38 stitches you have now 29 35 39 knits between heel markers including the stitch marked with 0 work first 8 stitches as set knit 18 20 24 stitches ssk k1 turn sm the heel marker when you come to it set up round 2 sl1 p7 p7 p11 p2tog p1 turn you should have 10 12 12 stitches at both sides of the gaps after/before the heel markers 5 r1 sl1 knit until 1 stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn r2 sl1 purl until 1 stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat r1 and r2 until one stitch before heel markers remains at both sides there is also one purl stitch outside the heel markers left on each side of triangular heel there are 51 58 65 stitches on needle 2 size s knit across the rest of the heel 8 stitches of simple intarsia as set p1 k3 two times place new bor at the beginning of needle 1 size m knit across the rest of the heel 8 stitches of simple intarsia as set p1 k3 two times p1 k1 place new bor at the beginning of needle 1 size l knit across the rest of the heel 8 stitches of simple intarsia as set p1 k3 three times pgluascsee nt ew bor at the beginning of needle 1 as the gusset eats the intarsia stitches it is done a little differently than usual we decrease to the same number of sole stitches as the instep stitches however we will make decreases outside the heel area rearrange the stitches on both needles needle 1 contains 33 36 41 instep stitches needle 2 scoiznet sa i ns the rest of the stitches needle 1 contains from left to right p1 k3 2 times 16 stitches of the motif which starts with p1 in mc p1 k3 2 times p1 33 stitches altogether sniezee dmle 2 should have the rest of the stitches of the round needle 1 k2 p1 k3 2 times 16 stitches of the motif which starts with p1 in mc p1 k3 2 times p1 k2 37 stitches altogether nsiezee dll e 2 should have the rest of the stitches needle 1 p1 k3 3 times 16 stitches of the motif whihc starts with p1 in mc p1 k3 3 times p1
